name: Dojo Garden
description:
Dojo garden is an ability game in which your goal is simply to reach the Dojo, located to the opposite side of your starting point, in time.
You will find many useful powerups during your trial, but also some bad guy which will try to stop you from learning new techniques.

Game Features:

- Random Map Generation, each new level will be unique, traps enemies and powerups will all be placed randomly inside the level.

- 6 characters to unlock, each character has a personal ability which will help you survive in the garden

- 3 different main weapons, Shurikens, Kunais, Fireballs

- 11 different enemies wich will try to stop you from crush the leaderboards

- 2 special bombs to clean the way

- Bonus and Malus powerups

- Hue mode to unlock

- 7 Achievements

- Leaderboards, compete with your friends!
